traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Geryon fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Geryon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
entries: Geryon regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Geryon dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Geryon makes two attacks: one with his claws and one with his stinger.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 23 (4d6 + 9 damage) slashing damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (DC 24) and is {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. Geryon can grapple one creature at a time. If the target is already {@condition grappled} by Geryon, the target takes an extra 27 (6d8 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Stinger
entries: Melee atk +16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one creature. 14 (2d4 + 9 damage) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or take 13 (2d12 damage) poison damage and become {@condition poisoned} until it finishes a short or long rest. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to half the poison damage it takes. If its hit point maximum drops to 0, it dies. This reduction lasts until the {@condition poisoned} condition is removed.

actions.name: Teleport
entries: Geryon magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary.name: Infernal Glare
entries: Geryon targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. If the target can see Geryon, the target must succeed on a {@dc 23} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of Geryon until the end of its next turn.
